# What we are going to learn today ...

1. basic graphics with **manipulate**

# Basic graphics with **manipulate**

```{r}
plot(cars)
```

#### Check this out:
```{r}
library(manipulate)
manipulate(
  plot(cars, xlim=c(0,x.max)),  
  x.max=slider(15,25))
```
